alert.note: Alert for Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Worcester, southwestern Norfolk, northwestern Plymouth, northwestern Bristol and northern Providence Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bellingham to Burrillville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. Locally heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Providence, Pawtucket, Taunton, East Providence, Woonsocket, Cumberland, North Providence, Franklin, North Attleborough, Milford, Attleboro, Walpole, Mansfield, Easton, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Norton, Sharon, and Foxborough. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
